content:
Hey Folks,

The IQSS project team would love your "use cases" related feedback on this issue: Feature Request/Idea: Make sure that for datasets published with CC0 waiver or standard license, metadata exports include the waiver or license

Do you have other user cases that need support? If yes, please describe it in the comment section of the issue (do not post it here, pretty please)

Please provide feedback within 7 days! May 5th
